trends.name: AI Revolution
trends.description: The AI sector is shifting from raw technological breakthroughs toward strategic market consolidation and enhanced user experience personalization.
key_catalysts: High-profile M&A activity and strategic partnerships
Product personalization and human-centric AI refinement
Widespread enterprise adoption for operational efficiency

trends.name: Obesity Drugs
trends.description: The transition from injectable to oral delivery and the expansion into non-metabolic indications like addiction are primary growth drivers offsetting pricing pressures.
key_catalysts: FDA approval of oral GLP-1 formulations for weight management
Potential expansion of indications into addiction treatment
Market penetration in China through strategic price adjustments

trends.name: Nuclear Renaissance
trends.description: Nuclear energy is pivoting from a legacy utility sector to a high-growth tech-enabler driven by the non-negotiable power requirements of AI infrastructure.
key_catalysts: Exponential energy demand from AI data centers and hyperscalers
Institutional validation through ARK Investment's stake in SMR technology
Global advancement and deployment of Small Modular Reactor (SMR) designs

trends.name: Cybersecurity
trends.description: The cybersecurity landscape is shifting from external perimeter defense to a crisis of internal trust and supply chain integrity.
key_catalysts: Rise of sophisticated insider threats within the security industry
Critical supply chain vulnerabilities in global manufacturing hubs
Massive scale data breaches driving regulatory and reputational risk

trends.name: Crypto Bull
trends.description: Institutional liquidity is rapidly professionalizing the market through ETFs and large-scale staking, outweighing negative security headlines.
key_catalysts: Institutional ETF inflows exceeding $1bn in XRP
Massive ETH staking by Bitmine creating supply squeeze potential
Increased governmental integration and adoption initiatives

trends.name: Quantum Computing
trends.description: The quantum sector is shifting from theoretical research to practical hardware miniaturization driven by national security and geopolitical competition.
key_catalysts: Miniaturization of quantum processors
Geopolitical race for technological supremacy between US and China
Increased strategic investment in hardware localization

trends.name: Space Economy
trends.description: The space economy is transitioning from government-led exploration to a high-frequency commercial race characterized by intense US-China competition and emerging environmental regulations.
key_catalysts: High-volume 2026 mission pipeline and deep space exploration milestones
Intensifying global competition from Chinese commercial startups like LandSpace
Technological shift toward satellite sustainability and orbital debris mitigation

trends.name: Reshoring
trends.description: Increasing operational risks in global logistics and overseas assembly are driving the strategic necessity for reshoring and domestic supply chain hardening.
key_catalysts: Supply chain security risks and cargo theft
Cybersecurity vulnerabilities in overseas manufacturing hubs
Strategic domestic consolidation in construction and infrastructure

trends.name: CeDeFi RWA Infrastructure
trends.description: The emergence of 'Exchange of Everything' platforms bridging centralized and decentralized finance to tokenize Real World Assets (RWA). This infrastructure aims to provide global liquidity for traditional assets through blockchain-based financial rails.
key_catalysts: Launch of All InX platform
Regulatory frameworks for tokenized securities

trends.name: Regional Bank Recapitalization
trends.description: Strategic consolidation of regional and cooperative banks supported by private equity infusions to stabilize balance sheets. This trend focuses on restructuring distressed debt (e.g., Swiss franc loans) and achieving scale in local markets.
key_catalysts: Warburg Pincus strategic investments
European cooperative bank restructuring

trends.name: Digital Inclusive Housing Finance
trends.description: Expansion of housing credit in emerging markets through digital-first, inclusive lending platforms. This narrative targets underserved demographics by leveraging digital foundations to drive real estate growth.
key_catalysts: Indian digital infrastructure expansion
Urbanization trends in South Asia

narrative_updates.description: The emergence of 'Exchange of Everything' platforms bridging centralized and decentralized finance to tokenize Real World Assets (RWA). This infrastructure aims to provide global liquidity for traditional assets through blockchain-based financial rails.
